metadata.h1: Best Olive Garden Lunch Deals for 2025? 👀 See Menu! 🍝
metadata.description: Trying the Olive Garden Lunch Menu? 🍝 Get the inside scoop on all the lunch-sized deals, prices, and hours for 2025. Don't miss out! 👇

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: PSA: The Olive Garden lunch menu is the ultimate life hack! 🙌 You get their legendary Italian flavors in perfect portions that won't send you into a food coma. The unlimited Soup, Salad & Breadsticks combo is ICONIC, but don't sleep on the lunch-sized classics. Let's get into these deals! 🔥

LUNCH-SIZED FAVORITES.description: Your fave Olive Garden dishes, but make 'em lunch-sized! 🤩 Available weekdays until 3 p.m. It's the perfect midday treat.

items.name: Chicken Parmigiana
items.review: The perfect lunch-sized portion of a classic! Crispy chicken, melted cheese, and rich marinara, all over a bed of spaghetti. It's a midday power-up that won't send you into a food coma. 💪

items.name: Fettuccine Alfredo (V)
items.review: Creamy, dreamy, and the perfect portion size. This is how you do lunch right. So good! 🤤

items.name: Lasagna Classico
items.review: A lunch-sized slice of heaven! All the cheesy, meaty goodness of the original, but you'll still be able to function after eating it. A true win-win. 🏆

data.title: Your Olive Garden Lunch Questions Answered! 💡

items.question: What are Olive Garden’s lunch hours?
items.answer: The magic happens Monday through Friday until 3:00 PM! 셋업. On weekends and holidays, it's the dinner menu all day, so plan accordingly.

items.question: Does Olive Garden have lunch specials?
items.answer: YES! And they are amazing. You can get lunch-sized versions of classics like Fettuccine Alfredo and Lasagna, and they all come with unlimited soup or salad and those famous breadsticks. It's the best deal in town! 🥖

items.question: Can I get the lunch menu on weekends?
items.answer: Sadly, no. The lunch-sized portions and prices are a weekday-only treat (Mon-Fri before 3 PM). Weekends are for going big with the dinner menu! 😉
